summary: This document contains various corporate resolutions and certifications related to the incorporation and management of Financial Informatics, Inc., later known as Southern Trust Company, Inc. It details the powers granted to corporate officers, the issuance of stock, and the corporate structure involving Jeffrey Epstein and his associates. The document highlights the corporate governance and financial management practices of the company.
